captions.text: What up you fucking sperm breaths.
It's almost time of this fucking Cup and it's getting hot.
If there are black blocs, we'll call the Hooligans to scare them.
Now let's see the squads of group G.
GERMANY
Germany is the European country where Adriano Imperador was born, the famous German Complex.
In Germany, everything is blonde, including the people's favorite beverage.
Germans drink a lot of beer the whole year, probably trying to forget that the best food there is sausage.
In Germany, the players are so disciplined that there're Nazi camps,
so dedicated that after training the jersey is not sweaty, it's swastika.
Their disciplined game has earned them three World Cup titles.
But the last time the Germans won the coach still was Albert Einstein,
a coach that always privileged the physical aspect, trading the traditional scheme 4 - 4 - 2 for
E=MC2
For this Cup, the Germans come with all their classic attacking strength that plays by music,
and have gotten to be known as the BBB orchestra:
Bach, Brahms and Beethoven.
In the album, all German players are laughing their asses off,
because the coach once more is doing his traditional snack on the bench.
The German squad is like Bayern Munich, but with the German jersey.
Let's see the highlights of the sour cabbage squad:
Neuer, the crack goalkeeper.
The defensive midfielder Schweinsteiger, I doubt you can write this name without consulting Googling it.
The midfielders Toni Kroos, Podolski, Gôtze and Ôzil, who has such goggle eyes that he looks like a Simpson's character.
There's also the strikers Thomas Muller and Miroslav "Roberta" Klose,
who thinks he can pass Ronaldo as the greatest scorer of world cups just because he has the name of a tranny.
PORTUGAL
It's the southwest European country nearest to South America, so much in distance as in its mess.
Known by world for its low IQ, Portuguese look like a codfish, who don't even have a head to think.
Portuguese are so dumb that all the country they colonized are third world and below.
That's why the biggest Portuguese joke is Brazil.
In Portugal, everything is opposite: men have highlighted hair, get waxings and pluck their eyebrows,
while women bear a nice mustache.
Portugal's jersey is bordeaux and green, to honor their biggest idols: wine and olive oil.
Besides those and CR7, the only famous Portuguese is "Portuga",
owner of the bakery who leaves the pen on his ear to make head counts.
In soccer they have always been known for the violence, because instead of wearing boots they wear clogs.
And just like their Brazilian branch, the poor Lusa, they've never won shit.
We've never won anything in soccer, but I've fucked a lot of naughty Brazilians.
Shut up, Manuel!
The players pretend they're machos, but love to dance the vira. While in field, turn into machos.
By night, turn into faggots.
On to the highlights:
The defender Pepe, who besides being a player, is a butcher,
and promises to make the foreigners prove the efficiency of Brazil's public health system.
The Real Madrid's back, Fábio Coentrão, who has a highlighted hair, just like Ana Maria Braga's.
And the star Cristiano Ronaldo, best of the world, who picked the player's career,
because if he had chosen to be owner of a bakery he would burn the doughnut everyday.
Sorry, but to me that's plain jealousy. Cristiano "Hot" Ronaldo is a show, is powerful,
sends the jealousy away and sends a kiss in the shoulder to the repressed.
Maria, you mustachioed, shush and take your asshole from my finger.
Go on.
GHANA
In the old local tribes language, Ghana means "King Warrior".
But Guerrero (warrior) is the king of another squad, Peru's, who didn't classified to the Cup.
But if we're talking about perus (dicks), the afros from Ghana win it all.
But Chinelo (slippers) is the name of the Chilean midfielder, not Peruvian...
No, wait...
Motherfucker, now I'm confused...
Ghanaian are strong as hell, and run like there's no tomorrow, but actually this squad only fools us.
It was against Ghana that Ronaldo scored his last World Cup goal, in 2006.
They were unlucky enough to be in the same group as Portugal and Germany,
and as no one has ever scored using their dicks, they'll go home after the first phase.
Moving to the highlights.
Muntari, Milan's second best negro, after Balotelli.
Essien, Milan's third best negro.
And the midfielder Kevin-Prince Boateng.
Fuck, Kevin Prince. They managed to have a worse name than Mil Grau, which is Kelvin Thiago.
Congratulations to these poor duo parents.
Coach: Kid Bengala (Brazilian Motumbo)
USA
The USA think they own the world. They're just a country, but are so full of themselves that they call the country America.
They were also colonized, killed all the native Indians, traded in Africans to work as slaves,
and have racism until today, but insist to call it the country of the American Dream, where everybody has freedom and opportunity.
It's from the USA that all the great Hollywood productions come, the biggest rock festivals,
biggest boobs, but what they're really proud is having invented the hamburger.
Walter likes this, then laid down, rolled and asked for an x-bacon.
The USA are wicked in basketball, baseball, American football, but in soccer they're pushovers.
You know that clumsy foreign kid who asks to play soccer in school and you let him out of pity?
Yeah, that's the American squad in the Cup.
They say the American League is growing, but the championship that once had Pelé today has Julio Cesar.
Let's see the highlights of Uncle Sam.
"Not Found"
That's all crazy folks from the internet, I've just arrived, but I'm leaving already.
Thursday, opening day, there'll be the last group with Belgium, Algeria, Russia and South Korea.
Out.
SUBSCRIBE

title: ÁLBUM DA COPA DO DESIMPEDIDOS - #07 GRUPO G
